title: The Witches of Scotland Book 1
description: It’s one thing to read about witches, it’s another thing to discover you are one.Glasgow law student, David Hunter is drifting through life and feels something is missing. When on a night out someone tries to kill him he discovers he is from a long line of witches known as Dream Dancers, his life is turned upside down.Now David has unwittingly exposed himself to a world of powerful witches, clandestine government agencies, and a fight to protect the Akashic records.Is a life filled with Magick really his true calling in life?If you love witches, magick, and conspiracy theories, you’ll love the first book in this fast-paced supernatural thriller series.
author: Steven P. Aitchison
